name: Build-A-Bot (LoriTom)
description:
Select a character to control, then build the boss you fight against piece by piece! The boss is made up of 5 parts, and you can choose a variety of pieces for each part of the boss. Your character has 4 different abilities, activated by using up (W) down (S) left (A) and right (D). Use these abilities to defeat the boss in turn based combat!

*currently this game has the illusions of choice as things were unable to be saved properly.
